roleset.name: regret, feel bad about
roleset.note: REGRET-V NOTES: Frames file for 'regret' based on sentences in financial subcorpus andautomatic expansion via verbnet. (from regret.01-v predicate notes)
REGRET-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to regret.01-v. VN class admire-31.2-1. FN class experiencer_focus. Framed by Katie. (from regret.01-n)
REGRETFUL-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from regretful.01-j)

example.name: regret an SBAR
example.text: Allianz also suggested, without saying so directly, that it regrets that Paribas isn't bidding for all of Navigation Mixte's shares.
example.arg: that Paribas isn't bidding for all of Navigation Mixte's shares

example.name: regret a VP
example.text: Mr. Price ``wanted to run the MTM business'' and may have regretted selling the company to TVS...

example.name: regret an NP
example.text: The federation said Friday that it regrets the resignation.

example.name: arg 0 only
example.text: Sony hosted for a year while he was on a Luce Fellowship in Tokyo, to the regret of both parties

example.name: arg1
example.text: Iraq's leaders have few regrets over the action that precipitated the Gulf War.
example.arg: over the action that precipitated the Gulf War

roleset.name: able/worthy to be reqretted
roleset.note: REGRETTABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from regrettable.01-j)
REGRETABLE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from regretable.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: When actual innocent civilians do die it 's regretable , but we both know that they are n't the intended target .
example.arg: When actual innocent civilians do die

example.name: arg1
example.text: When actual innocent civilians do die it 's regretable , but we both know that they are n't the intended target .
example.arg: When actual innocent civilians do die
